name: Western Roman Empire
startIntroPart1: The blessings of the gods be upon you, Augustus Majorianus, emperor of Rome and all her holdings (or what it remains of it). Your empire was the greatest and longest lived of all in Western civilization. And your people single-handedly shaped its culture, law, art, and warfare like none other, before or since. Through years of glorious conquest, Rome came to dominate all the lands of the Mediterranean from Spain in the west to Syria in the east. And her dominion would eventually expand to cover much of England and northern Germany. Roman art and architecture still awe and inspire the world. And she remains the envy of all lesser civilizations who have followed.
startIntroPart2: Time hasnt been on the side of Western Rome, decaying worth of our coin, Barbarian invasions, Civil Wars and an invasion of Eastern Rome has left a huge scar in our society and army however our army although depleted is still a formidable force worthy of the Rome of old however we lack the manpower to recruit new men into our Comitatensis units but some Barbarians roaming on our border might be willing to join us as Foederati for our armies, may you lead us to glory again, oh Augustus Majorianus and may our lord not led you Empire fall to treason from within
declaringWar: My treasury contains little and my soldiers are getting impatient... (sigh) ...therefore you must die.
attacked: So brave, yet so stupid! If only you had a brain similar to your courage.
defeated: God have deprived Rome of his favour. We have been defeated.
introduction: I greet you. I am Majorian, Imperator of Western Rome. If you are a friend of Rome, you are welcome.
tradeRequest: I offer this, for your consideration.
hateLetsHearIt: Diplomatic Guests are always welcomed...even if they are a Barbaric Civilization
hateNo: Neither Rome nor the Romans will take this offer in consideration
hateYes: And so our business is concluded...now leave before the Palace stenches like filth
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [15] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [70]% chance>
[+10]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities]
Unhappiness from number of Cities doubled

name: Eastern Roman Empire
startIntroPart1: The Eastern Roman Empire rests upon a pile of gold and other riches, while the west is ridden of barbarians and decadence the East is booming in population and economy, this hasnt gone unnoticed by our neighbors specially the nomadic ones...
declaringWar: My treasury contains little and my soldiers are getting impatient... (sigh) ...therefore you must die.
attacked: So brave, yet so stupid! If only you had a brain similar to your courage.
defeated: God have deprived Rome of his favour. We have been defeated.
introduction: I greet you. I am Leo, Imperator of Eastern Rome. If you are a friend of Rome, you are welcome.
tradeRequest: I offer this, for your consideration.
hateLetsHearIt: Diplomatic Guests are always welcomed...even if they are a Barbaric Civilization
hateNo: Neither Rome nor the Romans will take this offer in consideration
hateYes: And so our business is concluded...now leave before the Palace stenches like filth
uniques: Quantity of strategic resources produced by the empire +[100]%
[+4] Happiness from each type of luxury resource

name: Eranshahr
startIntroPart1: A Large eastern empire that matches the likes of Rome, Best archers in the world, masters of the horse and excellent administrative skill that keeps public order in check but also helps the empire field a large levy army under its banner
startIntroPart2: The Eastern nemesis of Rome and by far the most dangerous of them all, most of the conflicts with Rome were continuous with barely one decade of peace, the most devasting war came in 602 AD, after Khosrow the II declares war on a weakened Eastern Rome after some initial success defeat came for the Sassanids like a hammer, years of war caused exhaustion, continuous defeats and civil strife followed the deposition of Khosrow as Shahanshah by his son Kavad, he died 2 months later and a civil war began further more devasting a weakened Sassanid empire, in 651 AD Yazdegerd III was assasinated and so the Sassanid Empire met his end to the Arab-Muslim armies
declaringWar: Your continue existence is an embarrassment to all leaders everywhere! You must be destroyed!
attacked: Curse you! You are beneath me, son of a donkey driver! I will crush you!
defeated: You mongrel! Cursed be you! The world will long lament your heinous crime!
introduction: Peace be on you! I am Hormizd,Third of his name and outstanding king of kings of great Persia... but I suppose you knew that
tradeRequest: In my endless magnanimity, I am making you this offer. You agree, of course?
hateLetsHearIt: Diplomatic Guests are always welcomed...even if they are a Barbaric Civilization
hateNo: Not even a Parthian would consider this offer, WHAT makes YOU think we will!?
hateYes: Guess... this is the best deal we will get... we accept it, unwillingly
uniques: [-25]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]

name: Alemanni
startIntroPart1: A confederation of warlike tribes, the Alamanii were one of the most powerful tribes across the Rhine Rome had faced through centuries before his fall, they were conquered by the Franks in 496 AD
startIntroPart2: Although there is a massive technologic gap between us and the Romans the fierceness of our warriors will overcome anything they face on the battlefield
declaringWar: WAR, WAR is the call of men, and the gods shall lead us to victory against you!
attacked: We shall feast upon the ashes of your cities after we sack them and raze them to the ground
defeated: Woden has abandoned us, the skill of our warriors outmatched by trickery, may Donar struck your empire back harder, for now we shall mourn...
introduction: Welcome, I am Gibuld, Chieftain of the mighty Alamans
tradeRequest: It would be in your best interest, to carefully consider this proposal.
hateLetsHearIt: Spirits of the afterlife spare my arse, for what i hear what my enemy has to say
hateNo: This deal is even worse than loke tricks, we reject your worthless offer
hateYes: May the gods forgive me for accepting such offer
uniques: [+40]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities]
No movement cost to pillage <for [Military] units>

name: Kingdom of the Vandals and Alans
startIntroPart1: An Alliance of a Germanic tribe and Caucasian nomads seeking a new home after being displaced by the Huns and then the Goths drove them out from Spain, under instances of Bonifacius the Vandals crossed Gibraltar arriving to Africa, betraying the governor and establishing a kingdom there, the Vandals caused so much damage that a new word had been created thanks to them
Vandalism: , for they had caused so much damage when they sacked Rome in 455 AD, Vandals shared almost the same fate as the Carthaginians of old after a successful campaign by Flavius Belisarius in 533 to 534 AD Vandals were assimilated into north Africa, those who could fled to Visigothic Hispania and some were shipped to Constantinople and dissapeared a distinct ethnic
startIntroPart2: The Vandals control the bread basket of the Western Roman Empire so food wont be a problem along with other luxuries, thanks to their Alani allies they can field one of the best cavalry units in the world, however there are rumors that Imperator Julius Majorianus is building a massive fleet in order to retake North Africa, we must focus our efforts to reinforce our navy before theirs become unbeatable
declaringWar: WAR, WAR is the call of men, and the gods shall lead us to victory against you!
attacked: We shall feast upon the ashes of your cities after we sack them and raze them to the ground
defeated: Woden has abandoned us, the skill of our warriors outmatched by trickery, may Donar struck your empire back harder, for now we shall mourn...
introduction: Welcome, I am Gibuld, Chieftain of the mighty Alamans
tradeRequest: It would be in your best interest, to carefully consider this proposal.
uniqueName: Holds the Bread basket of Rome
uniques: [+5] Happiness from each type of luxury resource
